debug.description: Debug indicates whether or not Helm is running in Debug mode.

helm_driver.description: The backend storage driver. Values are: configmap, secret, memory, sql

plugins_path.description: The path to the helm plugins directory

registry_config_path.description: The path to the registry config file

repository_cache.description: The path to the file containing cached repository indexes

repository_config_path.description: The path to the file containing repository names and URLs

client_certificate.description: PEM-encoded client certificate for TLS authentication.

client_key.description: PEM-encoded client certificate key for TLS authentication.

cluster_ca_certificate.description: PEM-encoded root certificates bundle for TLS authentication.

config_path.description: Path to the kube config file, defaults to ~/.kube/config

host.description: The hostname (in form of URI) of Kubernetes master.

insecure.description: Whether server should be accessed without verifying the TLS certificate.

password.description: The password to use for HTTP basic authentication when accessing the Kubernetes master endpoint.

token.description: Token to authenticate an service account

username.description: The username to use for HTTP basic authentication when accessing the Kubernetes master endpoint.

atomic.description: If set, installation process purges chart on fail. The wait flag will be set automatically if atomic is used

chart.description: Chart name to be installed. A path may be used.

cleanup_on_fail.description: Allow deletion of new resources created in this upgrade when upgrade fails

create_namespace.description: Create the namespace if it does not exist

dependency_update.description: Run helm dependency update before installing the chart

devel.description: Use chart development versions, too. Equivalent to version '>0.0.0-0'. If `version` is set, this is ignored

disable_crd_hooks.description: Prevent CRD hooks from, running, but run other hooks.  See helm install --no-crd-hook

disable_openapi_validation.description: If set, the installation process will not validate rendered templates against the Kubernetes OpenAPI Schema

force_update.description: Force resource update through delete/recreate if needed.

keyring.description: Location of public keys used for verification. Used only if `verify` is true

max_history.description: Limit the maximum number of revisions saved per release. Use 0 for no limit

namespace.description: Namespace to install the release into.

render_subchart_notes.description: If set, render subchart notes along with the parent

replace.description: Re-use the given name, even if that name is already used. This is unsafe in production

repository.description: Repository where to locate the requested chart. If is a URL the chart is installed without installing the repository.

reset_values.description: When upgrading, reset the values to the ones built into the chart

reuse_values.description: When upgrading, reuse the last release's values and merge in any overrides. If 'reset_values' is specified, this is ignored

skip_crds.description: If set, no CRDs will be installed. By default, CRDs are installed if not already present

timeout.description: Time in seconds to wait for any individual kubernetes operation.

values.description: List of values in raw yaml format to pass to helm.

verify.description: Verify the package before installing it.

version.description: Specify the exact chart version to install. If this is not specified, the latest version is installed.

wait.description: Will wait until all resources are in a ready state before marking the release as successful.

block.description: Custom values to be merged with the values.
Custom sensitive values to be merged with the values.
Custom string values to be merged with the values.

ca_file.description: Verify certificates of HTTPS-enabled servers using this CA bundle

cert_file.description: Identify HTTPS client using this SSL certificate file

key_file.description: Identify HTTPS client using this SSL key file

ca_file.description: Verify certificates of HTTPS-enabled servers using this CA bundle

cert_file.description: Identify HTTPS client using this SSL certificate file

key_file.description: Identify HTTPS client using this SSL key file
